description: Number of nondecreasing arithmetic progressions of positive integers with sum n.
links: Lars Blomberg, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Lars Blomberg, C# program for calculating b-file
mathematica: a[n_] := Block[{i, c=Floor[(n-1)/2]+DivisorSigma[0,n]}, Do[ i=1; While[i*k < n, If[Mod[2*(n-i*k), k*(k-1)] == 0, c++]; i++], {k, 3, (Sqrt[1+8*n]-1) / 2}]; c]; a/@Range[73] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Feb 16 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
